ruling: - When this card makes an additional attack, the opponent can activate [[Disappear]] to remove the other [[Chain Thrasher]] from the Graveyard, and the attack stops. Do not proceed to the Damage Step.
- If you have 1 [[Chain Thrasher]] in the Graveyard and 1 on the field equipped with [[Twin Swords of Flashing Light - Tryce]], its still only gets 2 attacks.
